page.title: 20ENGLAND AND PAKISTAN
page.content: I came over from Pakistan six months ago. I had a terrible pain in my side but my dad would not let me have an operation in Pakistan. I like every thing in England; the veiws, the trees, the parks and the weather. There is more rain than in Pakistan. In Pakistan it only spits a tiny bit. My favourite food in Pakistan was chaparty and rice but in England I eat fish, chicken and egg. In Pakistan I played pitugom, tingeotit and running. Tingeotit is like hopscotch and pitugom is like Red Rover. I found the English language very easy to learn and I liked coming to school in England but in Pakistan I did not like school. We learnt Urdu, reading and maths in Pakistan. I like England better than Pakistan.
